extendedInfo.description: Android's Most Comprehensive Mortgage Rate & Credit Card Rate Review  from ERATE.comInstant Access to Today's Mortgage Rates from your phone. Get 50% more Mortgage Information! No other App provides all of the following: Rates, APR's Points, Fees, Monthly Payments and Rate Lock Periods for all 50 States! Turn phone sideways to view ALL the info. No Ads. Home Loan Programs 30 Year Conforming Fixed Rates 30 Year Jumbo Fixed Rates 15 Year Conforming Fixed Rates 15 Year Jumbo Fixed Rates 3/1 Adjustable Rate Mortgage 3/1 Adjustable Rate Jumbo 5/1 Adjustable Rate Mortgage 5/1 Adjustable Rate Jumbo 7/1 Adjustable Rate Mortgage 7/1 Adjustable Rate Jumbo 10/1 Adjustable Rate Mortgage 10/1 Adjustable Rate Jumbo Interest Only 3 Year ARM Interest Only 5 Year ARM Interest Only 7 Year ARM Interest Only 3 Year ARM Jumbo Interest Only 5 Year ARM Jumbo Interest Only 7 Year ARM Jumbo 40 Year Conforming Fixed Rates 40 Year Jumbo Fixed RatesERATE.com also brings you the best in Credit Card rates, too.  Choose to display among twelve different card benefits and features, including Lowest Intro Rate, Lowest APR, Best Overall Deals, Best Rewards, and Poor Credit.  The application also sorts for you according to rate, introductory rate, introductory period, rate type, annual fee and late fee to help you find the best card for you.

reviews.title: jluquette
reviews.comment: Just installed it - opened it - entered my data.  It lists 51 states including DC and even Puerto Rico - but NOT Louisiana - I live in Louisiana.  Completely wasted my time.  Wish I could give a minus-0 star rating. The last irritating thing about this is that I HAD to give it 1 star just so that I could submit this review.
reviews.author: A Google User
